sentences.sContent: Nancy wondered whether it was her destiny to live in England and marry Melvyn.
sentences.sCn: 南希想知道她生活在英格兰又嫁给梅尔文是不是命运的安排。

sentences.sContent: We are masters of our own destiny.
sentences.sCn: 我们是自己命运的主人。

remMethod.val: 音乐组合Destiny’s Child “真命天子”

words.tran: 注定（destine的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranOther: the things that will happen to someone in the future, especially those that cannot be changed or controlled
